text: Tituss Burgess (born February 21, 1979) is an American actor and singer. He is best known for starring as Titus Andromedon on the Netflix comedy series Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt from 2015 to 2020. Before, he starred in many Broadway plays. Burgess was born in Athens, Georgia. He is openly gay.Davies, Hannah J. (May 15, 2020). "Unbreakable Kimmy Schmidt's Tituss Burgess: 'I'm the most boring of the rainbow of gay men'." The Guardian. title: Tituss Burgess
